<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a cast between a &#96;target(&quot;dx&quot;)&#96; type and &#96;dx.types.Handle&#96;, which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is intended to be removed by the end of lowering. This is used to allow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// lowering of ops which need to change their return or argument types in a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// piecemeal way - we can add the casts in to avoid updating all of the uses</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// or defs, and by the end all of the casts will be redundant.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dxiloplowering-cpp-/oplowerer/#a20984af5cec72ee012a2da67d7aa78e2"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dxiloplowering-cpp-/oplowerer/#a20984af5cec72ee012a2da67d7aa78e2">createTmpHandleCast</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;Cast = OpBuilder.getIRB().CreateIntrinsic(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">        Intrinsic::dx&#95;resource&#95;casthandle, &#123;Ty, V-&gt;getType()&#125;, &#123;V&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    CleanupCasts.push&#95;back(Cast);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Cast;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dxiloplowering-cpp-/oplowerer/#a38e9b77a3c8508ea8ff0ba1f5bf81eba"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dxiloplowering-cpp-/oplowerer/#a38e9b77a3c8508ea8ff0ba1f5bf81eba">cleanupHandleCasts</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These casts were only put in to ease the move from &#96;target(&quot;dx&quot;)&#96; types</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to &#96;dx.types.Handle in a piecemeal way. At this point, all of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
